org.ldaptive.provider.apache

Class ApacheLdapConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ldaptive.provider.apache.ApacheLdapConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProviderConnection

    public class ApacheLdapConnection
extends Object
implements ProviderConnection
    Apache LDAP provider implementation of ldap operations.
